Summary: Strange inverse equilateral triangle light flash in the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Marysville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were on the way home driving north on Wadhams road pass Smiths Creek intersection when we saw a inverse equilateral triangle light up northwest of us above the tree line for about 30 seconds. The light was stark white no other colors in it. It formed a perfect triangle, the light did not continue up in the sky like a spot light does, but stopped at the straight edge of the triangle.
